name: Plan Variable Consumption Quantity
description: "the planned variable number of items consumed in the transaction at the given cost center (Plan Consumption Quantity - Plan Fixed Consumption Quantity), which is used in cost center utilization analysis (where plan and actual values are compared), stored as a decimal in the unit of measure for the transaction
The Unit of Measure (UOM) that is most common is hours. However, there can be other Units of Measure such as KG, CM, BAG, etc."
